Html: Curious if anyone has come up with values for the Survival Soft Cap, Target Armor, and Target Damage (Raw) for all the bears out there. Now that Hard Modes are being run by more and more guilds I was hoping someone had come up with some nice default values for these settings. Speaking ICC 25 HM's of course.
There are defaults for those in Rawr3 that you can copy for Rawr2 as well if you like.
Any chance of a backport of these options to V2?
